did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University Department of City and Regional Planning records, 1934-1974.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. Department of City and Regional Planning.

did.physdesc: Correspondence, organizational records, printed materials, and publications.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Mostly office files of Kermit C. Parsons dealing with the department's recruitment efforts during the mid-1960's when the department was expanding. Includes correspondence; conference materials; internship program records; records of department projects. Also, publications and reprints by the department and its members.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Mostly office files of Kermit C. Parsons; much of the collection deals with the department's recruitment efforts during the mid-1960's when the department was expanding. Includes correspondence between Parsons and John Reps, Gilmore Clarke (Dean of the College in the 1930's) and between Parsons and candidates for new positions; general correspondence; conference materials; internship program records; records of department projects; and related records. Also, publications and reprints by the department and its members.
